name: Captive Souls
description:
Remember! This project is still in development!

PSX Retro Shader by dsoft20

Downloadable files (as of August 21, 2021) are NOT in a too-playable state!

Do you like mysteries? 
You take the place of Heather Brooks, a 24-year-old news reporter who has to find information about a recent suicide. Collect every info and clues you can before you lose your mind! Let's go back to 1995 and discover things you shouldn't have!

Requirements:
Processor: Intel Pentium 4 @ 2.80GHz or Higher
Graphics: Shader Model 2.0 Compatible with DirectX 9.0c
Sound: Compatible with DirectSound
RAM: 256MB
Operating System: Windows XP SP2 or higher (Windows 2000 is compatible using KernelEx)
